name: Urethra DEMO
description:
Hi! I'm a very very very starter developer and that's the demo of my first game, Urethra. That will be a story-based retro-style game in a strange world. The full version will be here too, when it will be completed, I think in December.

WARNING! At the moment the stuff contains only hungarian language. Sorry for that, I will correct it soon, but that takes a lot of time. In the complete version there will be english too.
